Two colleagues used RSA with shared primes for their secure messages. Now, intercepted is ciphertext1: 5140723451036813754792708624036362005745829963971228809400007443084172667395407418310285157490762415476403622742341266347338110919964012495662242564518626, ciphertext2: 3820925785720302850378906457773731398254991889613287016654758153094955533022304387089630090799268359697827661271086209838819206922281544254281529973645592—can you crack their oversight and recover the message?

The flag format is flag{...}
n1=6542085310960893643105865843069262475254302294664967222185291005675245656648265153918471838096726836826910557982278025251048605639948532897024944885865561, n2=7454982992308466874783159009310195832330946775511518216292422317964636799645347809842037342285048878784208884348529153177133431579228026300742224453380429, e=6125705127636753394596595037459906542252940056250024484468765854317462513892932215799747250615145994835504907314896954912932685050633154436325814548357949

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{ukqqwcum}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: ciphertext1: 5140723451036813754792708624036362005745829963971228809400007443084172667395407418310285157490762415476403622742341266347338110919964012495662242564518626, ciphertext2: 3820925785720302850378906457773731398254991889613287016654758153094955533022304387089630090799268359697827661271086209838819206922281544254281529973645592
vulnerability: common factors
hint: When two RSA moduli share a common factor, computing GCD(n1, n2) can reveal the shared prime factor.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n1=6542085310960893643105865843069262475254302294664967222185291005675245656648265153918471838096726836826910557982278025251048605639948532897024944885865561, n2=7454982992308466874783159009310195832330946775511518216292422317964636799645347809842037342285048878784208884348529153177133431579228026300742224453380429, e=6125705127636753394596595037459906542252940056250024484468765854317462513892932215799747250615145994835504907314896954912932685050633154436325814548357949
extra_info: p=82027105419614397122464766900559829201809111074341045426959841369565472661889, q=79755164801860046717125274564979298456577740336951161557596425327588099897049, r=93473357002386910796680974829901283699050052476799459307549499468546198537621, φ(n1)=6542085310960893643105865843069262475254302294664967222185291005675245656648103371648250363652887246785445018854619638399637313432963976630327791313306624, φ(n2)=7454982992308466874783159009310195832330946775511518216292422317964636799645174581320233095327535072534814003766373525384319680958362880375946090154945760
subtype: common_factors
archetype: rsa
